item.description:
We were unable to line up a speaker for this month, although we have some possibilities for July or August. I'd like to propose we take up Lisa's idea on our message board about discussing the topic of Energy Descent. This would have been the topic of Chris' friend who went to New Orleans, except I haven't heard back from him. Lisa has some links about the topic in her message, at http://oilawareness.m.... Maybe anyone who has the time can read these and come prepared to summarize them for those who didn't, and discuss.

I'm still not sure if I'll be able to make it.

Location: Zero Station Gallery, 222 Anderson Street

For more information, see http://www.zerostatio...
item.name: Portland Maine Oil Awareness June Meetup
